effect.trials.infested.description: This effect has a 10% chance to make entities spawn 1-2 silverfish on getting hit.
effect.trials.oozing.description: This effect makes affected entities spawn two slimes upon death.
effect.trials.trial_curse.description: This effect causes nearby trial spawners to become ominous trial spawners.
effect.trials.weaving.description: This effect makes affected entities spread 2-3 cobweb blocks upon death.
effect.trials.winded.description: This effect makes affected entities emit a wind burst upon death.
